Main_Kitchen.Body: We find ourselves in the middle of the kitchen. We have the ingredients, but we're forgetting something else we need to actually make the soup!

The_Window.Body: The new waiter stands patiently on the other side of the window.
Dialouge: Hello sir! This is my first day, so I'm really excited to get going!
Not to be rude, sir, but will the soup be ready soon?
It's my first day as a waiter, hopefully I'll be as good as you are at it.

Stove.Body: Using the pot, we cook up a delicious soup that would please even the harshest critic. Time to send it off.

The_Pantry.Body: The shelves are lined with many kinds of tasty ingredients. We've already grabbed what we need from here for the soup.

Cabinets.Body: The Cabinets are filled with different cooking utensils, maybe even one that could help us.
Dialouge: Here we are! Now we can finnaly go and make the soup!

End.Body: And with that, the first order at the new reasturant was a success!
